title: 2021's top 10 clinical trial flops
author: Phil Taylor
description: Drug development always comes with a high risk of things going awry. One commonly quoted statistic is 90% of programs fail during the clinical trial phase, mainly because of a lack of clinical efficacy. Thousands of studies are registered each year in the U.S. alone, so every year there is a vast array of disappointing results to choose from as we compile this list. To narrow down the field, we sift through the casualties to identify the failures that had a material impact. | Thousands of studies are registered each year in the U.S. alone, so there is always a vast array of disappointing results to choose from as we compile our top 10 clinical trial flops.
